name: Face Landmarks
descr: Estimates face landmarks as a set o 68 points on an image or a video. Requires an image/a video and a CSV file with the coordinates of the faces. Produces a video and a CSV file with the sights of the faces.

options.text: Input pattern of the image, or video file.
Input pattern of the CSV file with detected faces or identified person faces.
Output file pattern with the sights.
Save landmark points in a CSV file
Draw landmark points on the image, or the video
Save result in a folder with image files -- if video input only
Save detected face sights in cropped images
Resize all the cropped images to a fixed width (0=no)
Resize all the cropped images to a fixed height (0=no)
